mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO, USER_ID, CREATED_TIME, USER_STATUS, CANCEL_COUNT FROM TBL_USER
SELECT MACHINE_NO, MACHINE_STATUS FROM TBL_MACHINE WHERE MACHINE_TYPE = '세탁기'
SELECT MACHINE_NO, MACHINE_STATUS FROM TBL_MACHINE WHERE MACHINE_TYPE = '건조기'
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_MACHINE SET MACHINE_STATUS = CASE WHEN MACHINE_STATUS = '사용가능' THEN '고장' ELSE '사용가능' END WHERE MACHINE_NO = #{machineNo}
mapper.select: SELECT i.INQUIRY_NO, u.USER_ID, i.INQUIRY_TITLE, i.INQUIRY_DATE, i.REPLY_STATUS FROM TBL_INQUIRY i JOIN TBL_USER u ON i.USER_NO = u.USER_NO

SELECT i.INQUIRY_NO, u.USER_ID, i.INQUIRY_TITLE, i.INQUIRY_DATE, i.REPLY_STATUS FROM TBL_INQUIRY i JOIN TBL_USER u ON i.USER_NO = u.USER_NO WHERE u.USER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%') OR i.INQUIRY_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%')
SELECT i.INQUIRY_NO, u.USER_ID, i.INQUIRY_TITLE, i.INQUIRY_DATE, i.REPLY_STATUS FROM TBL_INQUIRY i JOIN TBL_USER u ON i.USER_NO = u.USER_NO WHERE i.REPLY_STATUS = #{status}
SELECT REPLY_COMMENT FROM TBL_INQUIRY_REPLY WHERE INQUIRY_NO = #{inquiryNo} LIMIT 1
SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_DATE FROM TBL_NOTICE ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC
SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_DATE FROM TBL_NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_NOTICE (NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_DATE, ADMIN_NO) VALUES (#{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, NOW(), #{adminNo})
mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_DATE, ADMIN_NO FROM TBL_NOTICE ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT FROM TBL_NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo}
